```{r warning=F, error=F, message=F, echo=F,results='asis'}
library(countrycode)
username <- 
  Sys.info()['user']
pathOutput <- 
  paste0("C:/Users/", username, "/Desktop/R_Data_Write/")
setwd(pathOutput)
fileName <- dir(pathOutput)[grep('DP_LIVE.+\\.csv',dir(pathOutput),ignore.case = T)]
tmp0 <-
  read.csv(file = fileName,header = T,check.names = F,stringsAsFactors = F)
tmp1 <- tmp0
colnames(tmp1)[1] <- 
  gsub('.+(location)','\\1',colnames(tmp1)[1],ignore.case = T)
tmp1$Country <- 
  countrycode(tmp1$LOCATION,'iso3c','country.name')
tmp1$Country[which(is.na(tmp1$Country))] <- 
  tmp1$LOCATION[which(is.na(tmp1$Country))]
tmp1$Date <- 
  as.Date(paste0(tmp1$TIME,'-1-1'))
indicator <- unique(tmp1$INDICATOR)
measure <- unique(tmp1$MEASURE)
location <- unique(tmp1$LOCATION)
unique(tmp1$SUBJECT)
```

```{r warning=F, error=F, message=F, echo=F,results='asis'}
objSubject <- '20_24'
par(mfrow=c(1,2),font.maon=1,cex.main=1)
for(iii in seq(length(location))){
  tmp2 <- subset(tmp1,location[iii]==tmp1$LOCATION)
  obj <- subset(tmp2,objSubject==tmp2$SUBJECT)
  if(5 <= nrow(obj)){
    country <- 
    plot(x = obj$Date,
         y = obj$Value,
         type = 'o',
         pch = 20,
         cex = 2,
         xlab = '',
         ylab = '',
         xaxt = 'n',
         panel.first = grid(nx = NULL,ny = NULL,lty = 2,equilogs = T),
         main = paste0(indicator,'\n',
                       paste0(format(range(obj$Date),'%Y'),
                              collapse = '~'),'\n',
                       unique(obj$Country),':',measure,':',objSubject))
    axis.Date(side = 1,at = obj$Date,format = '%Y',padj = 0.5,cex.axis = 1,las=2)
    abline(lm(obj$Value~obj$Date),col='red',lwd=2)
  }
}
```
